name: Extreme Car Crash Test Simulator 3D Full
name_original: Extreme Car Crash Test Simulator 3D Full
description:
Tired of parking and driving simulators? Extreme Car Crash Test Simulator 3D is convincing vehicular personal impact simulation and your chance to have dismount fun! Usually, you have to avoid the obstacles on your way, but NOT HERE. In Extreme Car Crash Test Simulator 3D this would help you to get more scores, so…CRASH THEM ALL!

Break all that you can in your vehicle, dismount cars wrecking into walls or other vehicles and destroy everything on your way playing this 3D crash test simulator! Cause accidents and perform death-defying motor stunts without any risk to yourself! Try turbo cars, armored trucks, and even tanks and buses – it’s all for your pleasure, so - just demolish!

Extreme Car Crash Test Simulator 3D features:
Lots of funny levels and interesting tasks
Amazing car crashes physics and great realistic sounds
Obstacles help you to get more scores – crash them all
Turbo cars, armored trucks, tanks and another vehicle for your choice
Unlock new cars, vehicles, jumps, stunts and other facilities using points

Destroy varies vehicles - cars, trucks and so on - playing Extreme Car Crash Test Simulator 3D!
